mapper.select: select * from order_code where ID=#{id} order by NO DESC limit #{listSize} offset #{startList}
select * from order_code where ID=#{id} and ORDER_TYPE not in(select ORDER_TYPE from order_code where ORDER_TYPE='배달') order by NO DESC limit #{listSize} offset #{startList}
select count(*) from order_code where ID=#{id}
select count(*) from order_code where ID=#{id} and ORDER_TYPE='배달'
select count(*) from order_code where ID=#{id} and ORDER_TYPE not in(select ORDER_TYPE from order_code where ORDER_TYPE='배달')
mapper.insert: insert into order_code (id, name, tel, address, request, store_name, order_type, use_point, use_coupon, total_price, payment_list, payment_status, status) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{request}, #{store_name}, #{order_type}, #{use_point}, #{use_coupon}, #{total_price}, #{payment_list}, #{payment_status}, '주문 접수')

select MAX(no) from order_code
insert into order_list values(#{no}, #{menu_type}, #{menu_name}, #{quantity}, #{single_price}, #{step01}, #{add_topping}, #{add_meat}, #{add_cheese}, #{step03}, #{set_price}, #{menu_price})
mapper.select: select * from order_code where no=#{no} and id=#{id}
select menu_type, count(*) from order_list group by menu_type

select (row_number() over()) AS num, store_name from (select store_name, max(price) from (select store_name, sum(total_price) as price from order_code group by store_name) as best group by store_name, price order by price desc) as best
SELECT date(order_time), SUM(total_price) as total, avg(total_price) as average FROM order_code group by date(order_time) order by date(order_time)
